title: In Name Only - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Contracts   Handsome Male Lead   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Movies   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Pretend Lovers   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: Jing Shui Bian   木更木更   静水边
description:
Because of a shocking group sex scandal, two male actors took the initiative to bind themselves together. It’s a story about their sweet and professional life together.

A typical but not very traditional entertainment novel.

The jokes might be old, but they’re sweet.>
